headline: United States Confectionery Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring August Storck, Lindt & Sprungli, Ferrero, General Mills, HARIBO, Kellogg, Lotte, Mars
summary: The U.S. Confectionery Market is poised to reach USD 76.95 billion by 2033, up from USD 60.23 billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 2.76% from 2025. Growth is fueled by shifting consumer preferences, product innovation, and expanding retail channels. Key trends include healthier options like sugar-free and plant-based confections, digital personalization, and artisanal sweets.
